column4: I don't think he's asking about what is best.. just the differences between the two.. and any convincing reasons why he should try it.
the other way.. (there's lots of them of course) is to install pastbinit
if you've never used pastbinit the syntax allows pasting a file directly to pastbin and it returns a link. cat <file> | pastbinit -b http://pastbin.com
